thread.title: Our family of 6 lives in a 600 square foot home: You do the math

author: Whitney Barthel
title: Our family of 6 lives in a 600 square foot home: You do the math
text:
by Whitney Barthel posted in Life A couple of years ago, fellow blogger Sara McGinnis shared a story on how a family of 11 were living in an 1100 sq. ft. home. People -- including me --immediately lost their minds. It went viral. How do they do that? We are a family of 5 living... Read more Â» The post Our family of 6 lives in a 600...

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
